snippet.title: 【BLEACH/BBS】Bleach: Brave Souls Official Trailer
snippet.description:
It's Bankai time! Co-Op play for up to six players!
Bleach: Brave Souls, the 3D action game for mobile and PC based on the hit anime series, Bleach! 
*The above is development footage.

Download the game!
https://bit.ly/3wi5Fak

©Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot　©KLabGames

#BLEACH #BLEACHBraveSouls #BBS
